skills.name: Impact
skills.description: Unleashes a shock wave that has a 25% chance to stun and a 10% chance to taunt the enemy. This attack will deal more damage according to your Defense.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +15%

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Lava Blow
skills.description: Attacks all enemies at once, dealing damage proportionate to your Defense, and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Barrier (Passive)
skills.description: Reduces incoming damage by 40% when your HP falls below 50%. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.
